body: Dakkon Blackblade does not use it's creature card image.
author: [Landhotel.Westerwald](https://code.google.com/u/Landhotel.Westerwald/)
title: Dakkon Blackblade card image

comments.body:
Ahh, yes - that's a bit of problem for mtgimage.com - card and avatar with same name. Edited the image url to go via the set, not just the name.

Thanks for that!

**Status:** Fixed
comments.author: [ShawnieBoyUK](https://code.google.com/u/ShawnieBoyUK/)

content:
_From [Landhotel.Westerwald](https://code.google.com/u/Landhotel.Westerwald/) on March 15, 2014 16:24:21_

Dakkon Blackblade does not use it's creature card image.

_Original issue: http://code.google.com/p/magarena/issues/detail?id=520_
